profileAlternative.name: Gan Gao
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist - Analytics at Facebook
profileAlternative.summary:
I'm graduating from Columbia University with a Masters degree in Management Science (joint degree program offered by Columbia Engineering in conjunction with Columbia Business School) in December 2015 with a current GPA of 4.0/4.0.

I received my Bachelors degree in Hydraulic and Hydropower Engineering in 2014 with a second degree in Economics from Tsinghua University and graduated with a GPA of 3.8/4.0.

Abroad-study experiences at Columbia University broadened my horizons and given me immense international exposure.

Being associated with Simulmedia, S&P Capital IQ and FreshDirect have provided me with rich professional exposure and steered me towards my career goals.

To know more about me, please contact me at gg2572@caa.columbia.edu.

educations.title: Columbia University in the City of New York

given.text:
I hired Gan as a Quantitative Analyst Consultant after several rounds of interviews in which he was incredibly enthusiastic and thoughtful in his ability to solve complex problems in simple ways. Since then he has completed many flawless projects in which he has assisted in finding alpha-generating investments for the firm. I was particularly impressed with his ability to present his findings in a concise matter that was easy to explain and understanding.

As a team leader or a team member Gan earns my highest recommendation. Any employee would be lucky to have him.

Thanks,
Leon See less

I worked with Gan extensively during his summer internship at Simulmedia. He's impressed me with his ability to quickly navigate the data environment and pick up new technical skills. Gan is an outstanding problem solver and impressively delivered a working product for a difficult problem. Gan is an asset to any data science team. See less
